name: Showtime VR
summary: Showtime VR enables remote management of many VR headsets. The solution includes a 360 player which is installed on the headset and is able to play 360 and 180 degrees videos (2D and 3D) and 360 graphics and photos (panoramas) up to 8192x4096px as a slideshow. The controller application is installed on a tablet or PC/Mac. The content can be played synchronically on all headsets or asynchronically. Showtime VR is designed for business professional presentations, marketing campaigns activations, movie...
